data.title: Excellent late night delivery!
data.text: Ah, Maurizio's ... you saved the day (or should I say night!)  We were in St. Louis at a Cardinals game celebrating a birthday.  We'd been at the game most of the day, and that evening, spent some time imbibing in adult beverages.  We returned to our hotel after midnight and needed a little something.  (Let me add, this was the weekend there was a Cardinal's game, Lou Fest, and Beyoncé concert!)  We ordered a specialty pizza and were not disappointed ... even when it took over an hour to arrive.  They told us that in advance so we were prepared.  When we walked through the lobby about 100 people offered us money for the pizza.  It was New York style, not too much sauce and generous toppings.  Definitely worth every penny!  Ended a fun day with a belly full of good pizza!

data.title: Not too bad
data.text: New York style pizza. Large thin slices with thick crust. The sauce was a bit too sweet. We ordered a large pizza for 4 and that was enough. We ordered to go and noticed when picking up that they have karaoke on Wednesdays. Might go back if in the area.

data.title: Blah
data.text: I can't say that I've ever left this place satisfied. The wait times for food is sad and it has never really tasted good. If you have other options please try someplace else

data.title: Delivery!
data.text: Late night bar food and drinks. And they deliver! You can get a pizza, coke and a bottle of crown delivered. What more could you ask for.

data.title: Dont waste your time! Very disappointing!
data.text: Ordered from our hotel to be delivered. Called after 45 minutes and they said it would be another 45 minutes. An hour and 45 minutes later they called and said the order didn't get placed and they didn't have half the stuff we ordered. We cancelled the order and asked for a refund.

data.title: Gross
data.text:
Don't even think about going here. Every employee we encountered was rude! We were going to eat at the bar but the bartender never came and got our order so we went into the dining area. 
You place your order and then find a seat. 
The ice was out, the place had a foul smell to it and our glasses smelled like dirty rags. 30+ mins later when we got our pizza, a guy brought it to us that was so dirty. We didn't even want to eat our food. 
This place is so gross! And I even complained to the place and nothing was done about it. 
This place is so unsanitary I am surprised they are even open! They need a visit from the Health department!

data.title: Empty, poor service, disappointing
data.text: We got there, a family of five, and the place was empty - not one single person in the huge restaurant. After waiting for a few minutes, we asked what's going on and were told how it works. Ordered and sat down. The server was visibly dirty from cleaning the tables but went on to bring us our food. The pizza was horrible, even the kids didn't enjoy. The wings too forever to come - they forgot the order. Unless it was a "perfect storm", this place needs new management. Will not visit or recommend! RUN!!!

data.title: Center of Pie Cut Pizza was soggy and crust was invisible
data.text: This pizza was literally gross. We had delivered to our hotel room. The 20 inch pizza was cut like a pie. We could only eat the four inches around the crust as the center was literally just cheese stuck to the cardboard. You lifted a piece and more than 3/4 of the piece hung from the crust. It was edible but barely. We used a fork and knife.

data.title: great place for late night munchies
data.text: great place great food and fun place to go when nothing else is open.  they serve more than just pizza

data.title: Don't bother
data.text: Unless this is your -only- option for food, don't bother. They sell you on the buffet to not have as much of a wait for food, then they don't keep the buffet stocked and you will end up waiting just as long for sub-par pizza at best. Everything on the buffet was old and gross and even when they brought out new pizza it wasn't anything special. Staff seemed unorganized. They got two stars because they were clean and have a good location, otherwise not impressed.

data.title: Ok at best
data.text: Good selection on there dinner Buffett for $10.  Pizza, salad, chicken, etc.  the food is average at best.  Good quick in and out spot.

data.title: For the Price... Skip it
data.text: Love trying local pizza places when I travel and a delivery driver at our hotel gave us a menu and since they were open late we decided to give it a try.  Ordered a menu deluxe and a six pack of drinks.  Over an hour later and for nearly $40 we got a bland pizza with burnt dough bubbles on most pieces.  Delivery driver was rude and didn't give me the peppercinis we had asked for with our order.  Should have went with Papa Johns!

data.title: Great Place to Deliver
data.text: The pizza was excellent and we were glad you guys were open to deliver so late at night to our hotel.  We did ask for a couple of lemons but we didn't get those.  That's ok, we just wanted food!

data.title: Casino Pizza delivery place
data.text: When ever I am at Luminer casino hotel  ...I give these guys a call and order and it is delivered faster than the time quote  and it is great food

data.title: Not so great food
data.text: Went there to get a quick bite to eat.   Bought the deluxe pizza and I've had better from Little Caesar's.  Not worth the price.  When I come back, I will not be returning

data.title: HORRIBLE FOOD!!!!
data.text: I ordered delivery food from this place via grub hub. I specifically mentioned on my order to please include a fork, knife and spoon......I got a fork only. I also clearly asked to make sure my fried ravioli was hot when delivered and they were hard as a rock and cold. I then ordered a chicken breast salad. The chicken was horrible. It was rancid. I tasted 2 small pieces and then threw the entire salad away and then took a handful of activated charcoal capsules to absorb any of that nasty bacteria from that food. I strongly suggest eating anywhere else but this place.

data.title: Bad pie
data.text:
When I order pizza I expect a few things that lead to an awesome pie. 
1. Quality crust.  The crust was chewy and exceptionally soggy.

2. Great sauce.  The sauce at this place was bland and spread so thin it was almost nonexistent.

3. Toppings.  I ordered a two topping pizza and the onions that were to be included were spread so lightly you would had to look to find them.

Overall nothing was salvageable.  I had been on the road and working until 10pm and I still couldn't make myself eat it.  That night I opted for a bag of chips from the vending machine as eating that pizza was not an option.

Cafeteria pizza in college was better.  The price of this pizza was a bit pricey for a bad pie.

Sorry to be harsh but it's the truth.

data.title: Good Pizza
data.text: We had called in and ordered a pizza but once we got there to pick it up we decided to stay.  They guy working the bar was really rude when we walked through the door and we almost left.  The waitress working the restaurant side was awesome, she was really nice and friendly and made us feel welcome.  The pizza was good also, lots of cheese!

data.title: The best mostaccioli!
data.text: We ate at this restaurant on a rainy, week day night with few patrons in the bar at 8:00 pm at night so we sat in the bar area and watched the FIFA women's USA soccer tournament and ate the best Mostaccioli that we've ever had.  We shared a dish and it was more than enough for the two of us.  Thought we'd have room for dessert but the main dish filled us both up.  Wonderful service from the bartender and great food.  Might be hard to access this restaurant if the Cardinals are playing since it is located downtown and close to the stadium, but we were not rushed and had fabulous service and food.

data.title: Delicious Pizza and quick delivery
data.text: Very good pizza and awesome potato skins. Decent delivery time. Will order from this place again when in Saint Louis.
